com.interpss.core.algo.dclf

Interface ContingencyAnalysisAlgorithm

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.hazelcast.nio.serialization.DataSerializable, DclfAlgorithm, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, IBranchAngleShiftFactor, IDclfAlgoLookup, IDclfResult, IGenTDFactor, ILineOutageDFactor, IPowerTDFactor, ISensitivity, NameTag, NetworkRef<BaseAclfNetwork<?,?>>, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier, SenAnalysisAlgorithm
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContingencyAnalysisAlgorithmImpl

    public interface ContingencyAnalysisAlgorithm
extends SenAnalysisAlgorithm
    A representation of the model object 'Contingency Analysis Algorithm'. Contingency analysis algorithm definition. It contains a list of outage branches, and supports single or multiple outage, and open or closure outage analysis.

    The following features are supported:

    • Ca Performed
    • Outage Branch List
    See Also:
    DclfAlgorithmPackage.getContingencyAnalysisAlgorithm()

    • Method Detail

      • isCaPerformed

        boolean isCaPerformed()
        Returns the value of the 'Ca Performed' attribute. a flag to indicate if contingency analysis has been performed, and therefore it has CA results.
        Returns:
        the value of the 'Ca Performed' attribute.
        See Also:
        setCaPerformed(boolean), DclfAlgorithmPackage.getContingencyAnalysisAlgorithm_CaPerformed()
